# Eigenvalues of a Symmetric Stochastic Matrix

```{r, echo = T, cache = T}
# Set seed
set.seed(25)
# Set parameters
M <- 3
# Generate matrix
P <- RM_stoch(M, symm = T, sparsity = F)
P
# Run a batch
batch <- run_batch(P, B = 100, steps = 50, final = TRUE)
head(batch)
```
```{r}
eigen_crosscheck(batch, P, 0)
```



# Numerical Eigenvalue Analysis

```{r}
eigenvalues <- eval_frame(P)
eigenvalues
```
